SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DatabaseConnectionException
The DatabaseConnectionException class is a custom exception that indicates an issue with establishing or maintaining a database connection.
DatabaseContext
The DatabaseContext class provides methods for establishing a connection to the database.
Employee
The Employee class represents an individual employee in the system.
EmployeeDao
The EmployeeDao class provides methods to interact with the database for Employee-related operations, such as creating, retrieving, updating, and removing employee records.
EmployeeNotFoundException
The EmployeeNotFoundException class is a runtime exception that indicates that an employee with the specified criteria is not found.
EmployeeService
 
FinancialRecord
The FinancialRecord class represents a financial record associated with an employee.
FinancialRecordDao
The FinancialRecordDao class provides methods to interact with the database for Financial Record-related operations, such as retrieving records by ID, by employee ID, and for a specific date.
FinancialRecordDaoTest
The FinancialRecordDaoTest class contains JUnit tests for the FinancialRecordDao class.
FinancialRecordException
The FinancialRecordException class is a runtime exception that indicates an exceptional situation related to financial records.
FinancialRecordService
 
IEmployeeDao
The IEmployeeDao interface defines methods for Employee-related database operations such as creating, retrieving, and removing employees.
IEmployeeService
 
IFinancialRecordDao
The IFinancialRecordDao interface defines methods for FinancialRecord-related database operations such as retrieving financial records by ID, employee ID, and date.
IFinancialRecordService
The IFinancialRecordService interface provides methods for handling financial records.
InvalidInputException
The InvalidInputException class is a runtime exception that indicates an exceptional situation related to invalid input.
IPayrollDao
The IPayrollDao interface defines methods for Payroll-related database operations such as creating payrolls, retrieving payrolls by ID, employee ID, and for a specific period.
IPayrollService
 
ITaxDao
The ITaxDao interface defines methods for Tax-related database operations such as retrieving tax details by ID, employee ID, and tax year.
ITaxService
 
Payroll
The Payroll class represents the payroll information for an employee during a specific pay period.
PayrollDao
The PayrollDao class provides methods for performing database operations related to payroll records.
PayrollDaoTest
The PayrollDaoTest class contains JUnit tests for the PayrollDao class.
PayrollGenerationException
The PayrollGenerationException class is a runtime exception that indicates an exceptional situation related to payroll generation.
PayrollService
 
PayXpertApp
The main class for the PayXpert application.
Tax
The Tax class represents tax-related information for an employee in a specific tax year.
TaxCalculationException
The TaxCalculationException class is a runtime exception that indicates an exceptional situation related to tax calculation.
TaxDao
The TaxDao class provides methods for performing database operations related to tax records.
TaxDaoTest
The TaxDaoTest class contains JUnit tests for the TaxDao class.
TaxService
 
ValidationService
The ValidationService class provides methods for validating different types of input.
